--- Testing vfmadd213pd (Fused Multiply-Add of Packed Double-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---
[256-bit test]
Input a: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 
Input b: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Input c: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
Result: 2.000000 6.500000 13.000000 21.500000 
Expected: 2.000000 6.500000 13.000000 21.500000 

[128-bit test]
Result: 2.000000 6.500000 
Expected: 2.000000 6.500000 

[Special values test]
Special a: 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x0000000000000000 
Special b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
Special c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
Special result: 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000
